title: Tim Heidecker Is a “Humane Exterminator” in New “Portlandia” Clip: Watch | Pitchfork
text:
Open share drawer Tim Heidecker Is a “Humane Exterminator” in New “Portlandia” Clip: Watch His methods include turning the ants on to kombucha and introducing an “alpha ant” into the community Tim Heidecker 
The latest season of Carrie Brownstein and Fred Armisen ’s IFC show “ Portlandia ” has already been packed with special guests, including Jeff Tweedy and Run the Jewels . In a new clip, Tim Heidecker (“Tim & Eric”) guest stars as a “humane exterminator,” hired by Brownstein and Armisen to take care of an ant problem. His methods include turning the ants on to kombucha and introducing an “alpha ant” into the community to convince the others to leave. Watch the clip below, via The A.V. Club . “Portlandia” airs on Thursdays at 10 p.m. ET. 
Heidecker has been focused on his music career recently, releasing an album, In Glendale , last year, and following it with a number of politically - charged songs . Carrie Brownstein recently became the in-house music critic for HBO’s “Vice News Tonight.” Artists In This Story
